channel.title: [Delta] Adding New Interfaces?
channel.description: I spent most of yesterday trying to figure this problem out, and I don't want to spend all of today doing the same. I figured I'll just ask someone that has experience with this subject, as they'll probably know. I'm wanting to change the sidebar interface, and make the skills tab look different. I know what to do server-sided and adding setSidebarInterface(); and all of that. But how do I create a new interface and add it to the client? This is a Delta, and RSInterfaces.java isn't included in any of my client files. Also, which interface editor/creator would you recommend?

item.title: [Delta] Adding New Interfaces?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I spent most of yesterday trying to figure this problem out, and I don’t want to spend all of today doing the same. I figured I’ll just ask someone that has experience with this subject, as they’ll probably know. I’m wanting to change the sidebar interface, and make the skills tab look different. I know what to do server-sided and adding setSidebarInterface(); and all of that. But how do I create a new interface and add it to the client? This is a Delta, and RSInterfaces.java isn’t included in any of my client files. Also, which interface editor/creator would you recommend?
